org.loboevolution.pdfview

Class PDFPaint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.loboevolution.pdfview.PDFPaint

  • public class PDFPaint
extends Object
    PDFPaint is some kind of shader that knows how to fill a path. At the moment, only a solid color is implemented, but gradients and textures should be possible, too. Author Mike Wessler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected PDFPaint(Paint p)
      create a new PDFPaint based on a solid color
